name: Holiday Rush!
description:
Oh no! Santa's sled crashed and all the presents are falling! Control Santa and collect as many presents as possible to save Christmas!

This was submitted for the Yogscast Game Jam 2020. The theme was:  Surprise

How my game ties in to the theme:  You are trying to prevent a surprise, which would be broken presents.

"Wintery loop" by Emma_MA licensed CC0: https://opengameart.org/content/wintery-loop

"Santa Claus" by pzUH licensed CC0: https://opengameart.org/content/santa-claus-free-sprites
